name: gaia online fix clan and moderation navbar
description: fixes the clan nav bar so there are no gaps at all in the clan navbar DOES NOT affect guilds at all and does not affect any other part of the site, great for giving clans a much needed fix. will also fix the very fist version of the guilds page if you can still get to it. not that hard but gaia no longer provides a link to it. i wont either but its very easy to find if you know how to do it also thanks to a friend on gaia who helped with this ( Carlos )
additional_info:
problems? email me at juangarcia9930@gmail.com clans are very old pages on gaia and fixes may not last so ill do my best to monitor the situation and fix it as needed

notice as of 10/27 
does a very minor adjustment to the old arena's page which really isn't noticeable but the main change to the arena's page is from the guild navbar page
